publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3874 Ross Finnie: Full Public Inquiry Needed over Boundary Issue—That the Parliament believes that the Local Government Boundary Commission for Scotland must institute a full local inquiry into its proposed changes to the council boundary between Glasgow City and East Dunbartonshire as a result of the overwhelming public opposition to the plans. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-3874 Full Public Inquiry Needed over Boundary Issue (lodged on 6 April 2009) Robin Harper*
S3M-3874 Full Public Inquiry Needed over Boundary Issue (lodged on 6 April 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3874 Full Public Inquiry Needed over Boundary Issue (lodged on 6 April 2009) Malcolm Chisholm*
